messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: You have the chance to vote for a true Brexit candidate in me, born in Welwyn Hatfield, attended local schools, worked locally as a bus driver for the last 23 years. I have lived and worked in Switzerland and France in the hospitality industry and am married to a French wife I consider myself ANTI EU not ANTI Europe. Theresa May is selling this election to YOU on a ticket of Tories want Brexit, but this is not the case in Welwyn Hatfield, Grant Shapps is a self-confessed remainer. VOTE UKIP the true Brexit party. Yours sincerely, DEAN MILLIKEN

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Out of control immigration, over 1.8 million rise in population due to immigration since she has been in government.
Wasting £14 billion a year of your money on so-called foreign 'aid'.
The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR.
She won't commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.
Since 2010, May's Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees. Should have employed tens of thousands of nurses and carers in our NHS.
Our police forces have been cut by 20,000 officers and armed forces by 30,000 since 2010.

Please, don’t be fooled again by Theresa’s Tories.
Theresa May is selling this election to YOU on a ticket of Tories want Brexit, but this is not the case in Welwyn Hatfield, Grant Shapps is a self-confessed remainer. VOTE UKIP the true Brexit party.
